channel.title: How do i add crowns to Hybrid PVP
channel.description: How do i add crowns to hybrid pvp? There isnt a crown for donors, and when an admin or mod talks, you cant see your own crown, but other people can see it.

How do i add crowns to hybrid pvp? There isnt a crown for donors, and when an admin or mod talks, you cant see your own crown, but other people can see it.
